hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm not sure zecplus.de erfahrung Zero hours contracts could be viewed as a means to create more working opportunities, as a stepping stone from unemployment by offering an entry point into the work place. The other advantage of a zero hours contract is that it helps the employer get through tough economic times as it enables an efficient use of workers, as the flexibility offered by these contracts keeps costs down and boosts productivity.
